import React, {Component} from 'react'; import './App.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import MyNavbar from './Navbar/navbar'; import MyJumbotron from './Jumbotron/jumbotron'; import Day from './day/day'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; class App extends Component { state = { persons: [ {name: 'jaems', age: 12}, {name: 'jaesdfms', age: 122} ], jumbotron: true, showCalendar: false, calendar: 1, monthN: 'Jan', numOfDays: 31, monthBooking: [ {day: 1, booked: false}, {day: 2, booked: false}, {day: 3, booked: false}, {day: 4, booked: false}, {day: 5, booked: false}, {day: 6, booked: false}, {day: 7, booked: false}, {day: 8, booked: false}, {day: 9, booked: false}, {day: 10, booked: false}, {day: 11, booked: false}, {day: 12, booked: booked: false}, {day: 22, booked: false}, {day: 23, booked: false}, {day: 24, booked: false}, {day: 25, booked: false}, {day: 26, booked: false}, {day: 27, booked: false}, {day: 28, booked: false}, {day: 29, booked: false}, {day: 30, booked: false}, {day: 31, booked: false},], calendarData: [ {monthName: 'Jan', numberOfDays: 31, month: 1 ,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Feb', numberOfDays: 28, month: 2 ,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Mar', numberOfDays: 31, month: 3 ,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Apr', numberOfDays: 30, month: 4 ,booking: []}, {monthName: 'May', numberOfDays: 31, month: 5 ,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Jun', numberOfDays: 30, month: 6 ,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Jul', numberOfDays: 31, month: 7 ,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Aug', numberOfDays: 31, month: 8 ,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Sep', numberOfDays: 30, month: 9 ,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Oct', numberOfDays: 31, month: 10,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Nov', numberOfDays: 30, month: 11,booking: []}, {monthName: 'Dec', numberOfDays: 31, month: 12,booking: []}, ] } hidJumbotronhandler = () => { this.setState({ persons: [ {name: 'jaems', age: 12}, {name: 'jaesdfms', age: 122} ], jumbotron: !this.state.jumbotron }) } togglePrevHandler = () => { const currentMonth = this.state.calendar - 1 this.setState({calendar: currentMonth}) } toggleNextHandler = () => { const currentMonth = this.state.calendar + 1 this.setState({calendar: currentMonth}) } render(){ if (this.state.calendar > 12){ this.state.calendar = 1 } if (this.state.calendar < 1){ this.state.calendar = 12 } let jumbo = null if (this.state.jumbotron){ jumbo = (
); } else { jumbo = (

{jumbo}
); } } export default App;
